about_the_game: The 'Rock of Ages 3 OST - High Quality Edition' features fully remastered versions of the music in FLAC format. The OST delivers two variations of the music; one list with rock arrangements and a second list with symphonic/orchestrated arrangements.
detailed_description: The 'Rock of Ages 3 OST - High Quality Edition' features fully remastered versions of the music in FLAC format. The OST delivers two variations of the music; one list with rock arrangements and a second list with symphonic/orchestrated arrangements.
legal_notice: ©2019-2020 ACE Team Software. All Rights Reserved. Published by Maximum Entertainment™. Maximum Entertainment™ is a registered trademark of Maximum Entertainment, LLC. All rights reserved. All other trademarks or registered trademarks belong to their respective owners.
name: Rock of Ages III Original Soundtrack (High Quality)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64-bit Required)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-760 2.8 GHz / AMD Athlon X4 740 3.2 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64-bit Required)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4771 3.5 GHz / AMD FX-9370 4.4 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11

nzoflc.descriptors: Mild crude humour and comedic violence, online interactivity

oflc.descriptors: Mild crude humour and comedic violence, online interactivity

short_description: The 'Rock of Ages 3 OST - High Quality Edition' features fully remastered versions of the music in FLAC format.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Japanese, Korean, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
